This Privacy Policy provides information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website. Information We Collect: 1.1 Personal Information: When you visit our website, we may collect personally identifiable information such as your name, email address, phone number, and billing information. This information is collected when you make a reservation, sign up for our newsletter, or participate in any promotional activities. 1.2 Non-Personal Information: We may also collect non-personal information when you browse our website, such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies. This information helps us improve our website and provide a better user experience. 2.
